ygData.subject: Re: Banded Prices
ygData.msgSnippet: Your model is wrong.  Ore, free?  What the hell are you thinking?  First, it s free if you kill a creature that drops it (not worth time).  Second, ore isn t
ygData.messageBody:
Your model is wrong. Ore, free? What the hell are you thinking? First,
it's free if you kill a creature that drops it (not worth time). Second,
ore isn't needed for making armor.

Now, as for molds. Since you used a tunic in your letter, I will use it as
well. A Tunic molds costs over 1pp. It requires 3 metal sheets, all of
which also cost over 1pp. Then the water, at a palsy 1sp or so.

I sell my tunics at 17pp. I consider this a fair price, and many else have
agreed with me (as I have sold many many many for this price). How can you
say it's a bit steep? It is MY choice to sell for the price that I see fit.
It is not up to you to decide how much I feel my time is worth.

On any account, there will (for the most part) always be a flow, if not
constant, for banded. Seeing as how new people begin the game, or old
people create new characters (that are not always twinked mind you), we will
have other's to sell to.

Haijar the Mage Blacksmith
"With how little weight I can carry, you damn well better appreciate this
armor! Hehehe"
